Kuber.title: Kuber
Kuber.description: Kuber is an easy-difficulty DFIR sherlock featuring Kubernetes cluster examination, and finding a malicious pod.

Loggy.title: Loggy
Loggy.description: Loggy is an easy-difficulty malware analysis sherlock focusing on reverse engineering of a keylogger written in Golang, analyzing its data exfiltration mechanisms and extracting compromised credentials.

Compromised.title: Compromised
Compromised.description: Compromised is an easy-difficulty SOC sherlock involving PCAP analysis of a Pikabot malware infection, focusing on initial access vectors and C2 infrastructure identification.

Psittaciformes.title: Psittaciformes
Psittaciformes.description: Psittaciformes is an easy-difficulty DFIR sherlock involving log analysis, bash history forensics, git repository analysis and code review.
